CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 16, 1952, pg. 13, reads: "Enjoying Outing - ...Lower photo: Grandfathers are still gallant as is shown in picture. The fathers of yester-year are preparing to give the ladies a swing before taking a round themselves.  Left to right, the men are T. Hamilton, Len Holland, James Hughes and Thomas Williams. The picnic was given by the James E. East Missionary Society of Ebenezer Baptist Church.  More than 125 fathers and mothers over 70 years took advantage of the outing. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Men, including T. Hamilton, Len Holland, James Hughes and Thomas Williams standing behind elderly women seated on swings, at Highland Park picnic
